mapper.sql: a.uid AS "uid", a.comp_usercount AS "compUsercount", a.comp_area AS "compArea", a.comp_ci AS "compCi", a.comp_management AS "compManagement", a.inspection_state AS "inspectionState", a.inspection_description AS "inspectionDescription", a.inspection_time AS "inspectionTime", a.back_remark AS "backRemark", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.z_one AS "zOne", a.z_two AS "zTwo", a.z_three AS "zThree", a.z_onetime AS "zOnetime", a.z_twotime AS "zTwotime", a.z_threetime AS "zThreetime", a.z_one_remark AS "zOneRemark", a.z_two_remark AS "zTwoRemark", a.z_three_remark AS "zThreeRemark", a.z_four AS "zFour", a.z_five AS "zFive", a.z_fourtime AS "zFourtime", a.z_fivetime AS "zFivetime", a.z_four_remark AS "zFourRemark", a.z_five_remark AS "zFiveRemark", a.z_six AS "zSix", a.z_sixtime AS "zSixtime", a.z_six_remark AS "zSixRemark", a.z_train_state AS "zTrainState"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pm_userinfo_sup( uid, comp_usercount, comp_area, comp_ci, comp_management, inspection_state, inspection_description, inspection_time, back_remark, update_time, z_one, z_two, z_three, z_onetime, z_twotime, z_threetime, z_one_remark, z_two_remark, z_three_remark, z_four, z_five, z_fourtime, z_fivetime, z_four_remark, z_five_remark, z_six, z_sixtime, z_six_remark, z_train_state ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{compUsercount}, #{compArea}, #{compCi}, #{compManagement}, #{inspectionState}, #{inspectionDescription}, #{inspectionTime}, #{backRemark}, #{updateTime}, #{zOne}, #{zTwo}, #{zThree}, #{zOnetime}, #{zTwotime}, #{zThreetime}, #{zOneRemark}, #{zTwoRemark}, #{zThreeRemark}, #{zFour}, #{zFive}, #{zFourtime}, #{zFivetime}, #{zFourRemark}, #{zFiveRemark}, #{zSix}, #{zSixtime}, #{zSixRemark}, #{zTrainState} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pm_userinfo_sup SET uid = #{uid}, comp_usercount = #{compUsercount}, comp_area = #{compArea}, comp_ci = #{compCi}, comp_management = #{compManagement}, inspection_state = #{inspectionState}, inspection_description = #{inspectionDescription}, inspection_time = #{inspectionTime}, back_remark = #{backRemark}, update_time = #{updateTime}, z_one = #{zOne}, z_two = #{zTwo}, z_three = #{zThree}, z_onetime = #{zOnetime}, z_twotime = #{zTwotime}, z_threetime = #{zThreetime}, z_one_remark = #{zOneRemark}, z_two_remark = #{zTwoRemark}, z_three_remark = #{zThreeRemark}, z_four = #{zFour}, z_five = #{zFive}, z_fourtime = #{zFourtime}, z_fivetime = #{zFivetime}, z_four_remark = #{zFourRemark}, z_five_remark = #{zFiveRemark}, z_six = #{zSix}, z_sixtime = #{zSixtime}, z_six_remark = #{zSixRemark}, z_train_state = #{zTrainState} WHERE id = #{id}
